mapper.insert: insert into img(url, uploadtime, name, size, descript) VALUES (#{url}, #{uploadtime}, #{name}, #{size},#{descript})
mapper.update: update img set url = #{url} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from img where name not like '%.jpg' and name not like '%.png' and name not like '%.gif' and name not like '%.webp' and name not like '%.jpeg' and name not like '%.mp4'
mapper.select: select * from img where name not like '%.jpg' and name not like '%.png' and name not like '%.gif' and name not like '%.webp' and name not like '%.jpeg' and name not like '%.mp4'
